Reviews.Title: great price for the item
Reviews.Author: Quinton
Reviews.Content: Extremely good price for this item! I got this for my little cousin and it's great for him! Great for games, work, internet searching, ect.

ProductInfo.Features:
Upgrade from the classic Megafeis M700 with new dual-core CPU to boost the performance and new high quality coating like piano
8GB storage capacity to hold your apps, photos, video and other files
Built-in webcam and microphone let you keep in touch with others via video and voice messaging
Wireless connectivity for cable-free networking
AndroidTM 4.1 offers versatile functionality
ProductInfo.Name: Megafeis® 7" Dual Core M700plus Google Android 4.1 Tablet Pc, Hd 1024x600, Google Play Pre-load, Hdmi, 3d Game Supported
